snippet: Jim Furyk won his first PGA Tour event in five years, making birdies on both playoff holes to outlast Kevin Kisner at the RBC Heritage on Hilton Head Island, S.C.
abstract: Jim Furyk shoots 63 in final round of RBC Heritage to win with 18-under-par 266.
lead_paragraph: Jim Furyk won his first PGA Tour event in five years, making birdies on both playoff holes to outlast Kevin Kisner at the RBC Heritage on Hilton Head Island, S.C.
